locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: A year ago I was here many times, and each time the laundry was not working and there were long lines for the shower. A year later the situation has not changed. If you need to shower and wash your clothes, choose another truck stop.

I wish I got the guy‚Äôs name I stopped in Lebanon tn fueled truck for some reason card reader didn‚Äôt put shower on my card ( didn‚Äôt know at time) drove to Calhoun ga got parked went in for shower found out I didn‚Äôt have a shower credit. Show ‚Ä¶
Nice, clean truck stop, great customer service, BUT it takes HOURS to get a shower here. Four people come out of the showers, one person ahead of me, two hours later, still waiting on a shower.

As many times as I have stopped and stayed here for either a 10 hour break or a 34 I have never had to wait over 3 hours for a shower like I did tonight. That is beyond ridiculous. Only 1 guy cleaning showers and he was too busy talking to ‚Ä¶
They didn‚Äôt clean available shower I was wait 2 hours
Waiting a long time for a shower. They really take there time to clean the showers. If u want to be quick don't go here
‚Ä¶ They have safe, clean showers. I‚Äôd never used a travel stop shower before, and a kind cashier walked me through what to do and assured me I was safe. It was a great shower! ‚Ä¶

For drivers those who used or will use there showers please be careful for your privacy on shower No-5 door of that shower have gap below your knees when you stand by door. Even you close it still anyone can see you from outside so be aware ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is always nice and helpful. The bathroom is clean. I've never took a shower there. But I do know that if they are out of showers the manger is nice enough to run to dollar store down the road and buy more. And that he also helps the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . Now it‚Äôs meth heads as far as the eye can see. Then pilot chooses to hire some as well. I walk up stairs to shower. The manager going 1000 mph walks/runs pass me looks at me and keeps going. I‚Äôm like maybe someone else is back here. It‚Äôs ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ you to Love's.  Dirty lot and overflowing garbages all afternoon, 15 hrs plus.  Compared to the high Love's standard, dirty showers with previous customers' hair.  Broken taps both in the shower and sink.   Dirty floors that haven't ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs a nightmare place for both the store and the mechanics. If you want to know what am talking about try a business trip for either an oil change, buy fuel, or ask for a shower. It‚Äôs the opposite of the sign logo which says on the wall ‚Ä¶
I stay at this Love's Travel Stop every weekend unless I have an event to attend and the showers are never thoroughly cleaned. One time, there were dirty towels still left in the shower. ‚Ä¶

At 3:30am Friday,  three showers are working ( that's what I was told) 4 customers waiting. üò°now it's 4:26am , no shower available yet, she told me there's just two employees working, why don't have more employee? ‚Ä¶

This location is pretty new. The showers are a good size, you have plenty of room. Plenty of hooks to hang whatever you need to hang. The hot water in the shower was very hot, which was very nice. There was plenty of water pressure even if ‚Ä¶
They don't even deserve one star. Shower is only clean right where you stand. Truckers haul your stuff to you. They deserve better.

Review for shower #4: it's disappointing how Love's keeps building new locations, but their protocol to KEEP them looking new & clean hasn't changed. The location is roughly a year old & the showers are already breaking down. See pictures. ‚Ä¶
Dirty shower, no soap in any dispenser, hot water was running out, mold on walls.

Very rude person was a cashier ! I booked a shower, the shower was not ready and they said we don‚Äôt have available showers!!! When I showed the proved that I booked the shower than they opened another shower for me. Bad experience and ‚Ä¶
Best place for sleep and shower...It's total new check my picture. And I try video inside üöª. ‚Ä¶

locations.title: TA Travel Center

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ of the nastiest truck stops I've been to. Fuel island was an oil slick. Obviously hadn't been cleaned in a coons age. Showers were disgusting. Very hastily "cleaned" not swept/ mopped mirror was filthy mold everywhere and the shower ‚Ä¶
Front desk, both ladies are unhelpful.  I asked them my truck smart isn't working, and I want to use my phone number for rewards to get a shower, but they keep refusing to help me.

‚Ä¶ parking lot, hire weaklings as security guards to enforce it. I paid for a spot but spent no penny on any other service. Not even shower, the place is nasty. 27 miles away is Loves, do yourself a favor and bypass unless you have emergency.
Not sure where to start. I will just say Shower wasn‚Äôt cleaned but I guess the person brought the bottle in to start on it. 95% of this place is reserved parking and is pre booked.

‚Ä¶ Cashier on May 7, 2024 at 9:28 pm was completely rude. We went to get a shower and the machine for whatever reason didn't print the receipt.  So my husband went up to ask for help. She reluctantly helped him and after of course, followed up ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ All the bathrooms were shut down at the same time‚Ä¶only option for ladies was to sneak in to a used shower stall. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ year I've come to Nashville on the weekends and worked for Uber and Lyft. I sleep in your parking lot and pay for a shower every night and fuel up every morning. Only to be told by a new security guard that I'm trespassing after a length ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ money out of truck drivers. This TA in particular is no different. Also, we tried to take a showers the next morning at 5:30 am before the morning rush and we were told that we couldn't shower. Why, you ask? Well, I'll tell you. Apparently ‚Ä¶
TA at antioch staff asking for diver license / ID to buy a shower..
